The Silent Hill Experience

How to use:
1. Create a new folder inside your ISO Folder. Name it VIDEO
2. Copy the ISO inside the VIDEO folder, path: E:ISOVIDEOSHill-Experience.iso
3. Leave USB mode. Press Select on the PSP.  Move the cursor to Ã¢â‚¬Å“ISO VIDEO MOUNTÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ and press left/right

5. To play the Video, go to the Video menu -> UMD and press X.
